name: xBlrrer
description:
Time to xBlrror

xBlrrer is a metroidvania, where you will need to find abilities to overcome obsticals.

You are Blrr, a crow who wants to find the person who wants to demolish its forest.

Use [W][A][S][D] and [Space] to navigate through the first level.

This is a Proof of Concept still, and since it is open source, the up to date version will be found here to play:
Play xBlrrer on Github
